update pay_withdrawals set store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, withdrawals_no = #{withdrawalsNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, withdrawals_transaction_no = #{withdrawalsTransactionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_fee = #{totalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, real_fee = #{realFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cmms_amt = #{cmmsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, audit_desc = #{auditDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, callback_status = #{callbackStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, callback_reason = #{callbackReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, callback_cmms_amt = #{callbackCmmsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, flow_direction_type = #{flowDirectionType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, flow_direction_name = #{flowDirectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, swiftCode = #{swift_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_account = #{paymentAccount,jdbcType=CHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_by_name = #{updatedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, buyer_id = #{buyerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transaction_id = #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, callback_money = #{callbackMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, time_end = #{timeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: sui.store_name as storeName,sui.store_mobile as storeMobile, sui.store_address as storeAddress,sui.store_region_code as storeRegionCode, sui.contact_mobile as contactMobile,sui.openid as openid,sui.store_status as storeStatus

sbc.card_number as cardNumber,sbc.bank_name as flowDirectionName,sbc.band_branch_name as bandBranchName, sbc.mobile as storeMobile,sbc.bank_name as bankName,sbc.bank_user_name as bankUserName,sbc.swift_code as swiftCode
mapper.select: select ,sbk.total_moeny as totalMoney,sbk.presented_money as totalFee from store_user_info sui left join store_bankroll sbk on sui.store_id = sbk.store_id where sui.id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and sui.store_status = 1

select ,sui.store_name as storeName,sbk.total_moeny as totalMoney,sbk.presented_money as totalFee from store_bank_card sbc left join store_bankroll sbk on sbc.store_id = sbk.store_id left join store_user_info sui on sbc.store_id = sui.id where sbc.store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and sbc.status = 1 order by sbc.created DESC,sbc.updated desc
